verbs.description: Instead of [V: briefing] [ARG1: documents] , [ARG0: President Trump] is supplied with flash cards by professionals at the National Security Council .
Instead of briefing documents , President Trump [V: is] supplied with flash cards by professionals at the National Security Council .
[ARGM-ADV: Instead of briefing documents] , [ARG2: President Trump] is [V: supplied] [ARG1: with flash cards] [ARG0: by professionals at the National Security Council] .
